entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Periods of rain beginning early this evening. A few wet flurries inland this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the Strait of Georgia late this evening and overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers in the evening. 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023
